alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 7:19PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Vilas County through 800 PM CDT... At 719 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mercer, or 11 miles north of Turtle Flambeau Flowage, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Winchester around 735 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Border Lakes Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Wisconsin.
